zooproject

Class Zoo

  • java.lang.Object
    • zooproject.Zoo

  • public class Zoo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will have a number of Enclosures containing Animals, a collection of Zookeepers assigned to those enclosures, and will organise the day to day running of the zoo

        Check Enclosure on belonging to the Zoo
        Parameters:
        enk - Enclosure object
        Returns:
        true if it is in the Enclosures list

      • aMonthPassed

        public void aMonthPassed()
        All event that happen in the Zoo during the month. Each Enclosure will have aMonthPasses() called on it. This will in turn then call the method on all the Animals in the Enclosure. Each Zookeeper (once these have been implemented) will have aMonthPasses() called on it Each Animal in the zoo will be checked to see if its health is 0. If so, it will be removed from the zoo. The zoo Foodstore can be restocked. Dead animals removed.

      • go

        public void go()
        this make 0.5 sec pause between months

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
